Chatter

Jun 2016

Overview

Development Node JS, Socket.IO, Say.js, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS3
Team size Solo
Category Personal Project
Available links GitHub Repository

Project description

Inspired by the online chatting application Discord, I implemented a chatroom service with web sockets that features text-to-speech (TTS) functionality. My main goal for this project was to familiarize myself with the Node JS framework, but it is possible that I will add more features to it in the future.

Responsibilities

  • Designed CSS styling and html layout
  • Implemented chat and storage functionality
  • Forked Say.js repository, added bugfix for stopping TTS on Windows
